data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Khammouan. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Khammouan, Laos

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Khammouan, Laos from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Khammouan.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Khammouan.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Khua people. Make the Khua people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Khammouan, Laos to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Khammouan access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Khammouan, Laos, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

location.name: Khammouan
location.people_groups_list: Nguon, Vietnamese, Saek, Chut, So Tri
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Nguon (800), Vietnamese (122,000), Saek (3,900), Chut (400), So Tri (11,000)
